# Task 1: Project Scaffolding + Shared Types Package

## Objective
Initialize the monorepo workspace, create the shared TypeScript types package with all type definitions, permission bitflags, and WebSocket event types.

## Status: COMPLETE (generated by initial setup)
This task has already been completed as part of the initial project generation. The files below exist and should NOT be recreated. This file serves as reference documentation for what was set up.

## Files Created
- `package.json` - Root workspace config (npm workspaces)
- `.gitignore` - Standard Node.js ignores
- `.env.example` - All required environment variables
- `packages/shared/package.json` - Shared types package config
- `packages/shared/tsconfig.json` - TypeScript config
- `packages/shared/src/index.ts` - Barrel export
- `packages/shared/src/types/*.ts` - User, Server, Channel, Message, Role, Invite, Voice types
- `packages/shared/src/permissions.ts` - Permission bitflags and utility functions
- `packages/shared/src/ws-events.ts` - WebSocket event type definitions
- `server/package.json`, `server/tsconfig.json` - Server package skeleton
- `server/src/index.ts`, `server/src/app.ts`, `server/src/config.ts` - Server entry points
- `client/package.json`, `client/tsconfig.json`, `client/vite.config.ts` - Client package skeleton
- `client/tailwind.config.ts`, `client/postcss.config.js` - Styling config
- `client/index.html`, `client/src/main.tsx`, `client/src/App.tsx` - React entry
- `client/src/styles/globals.css` - Global styles with Discord dark theme
- `docker-compose.yml`, `server/Dockerfile`, `client/Dockerfile` - Docker infrastructure
- `nginx/nginx.conf` - Reverse proxy config

## Key Conventions Established
- Snowflake IDs serialized as strings in JSON (JavaScript can't safely handle 64-bit integers)
- Permission values are bigint, serialized as strings
- All timestamps are ISO 8601 strings
- WebSocket events use `{ op: string, d: object }` format
- Shared package is `@discord-clone/shared`, imported as workspace dependency
